main event: On April 6, 1958, a sighting of a bright red object shaped like a half-gallon jar, along with several other ships, was reported.
interesting points: The main object was described as bright red and shaped like a half-gallon jar, with two additional ships alongside, one of which was very small.
The size of the additional ships varied, and they appeared to dim in darkness.
The witness observed a bright light in the sky and saw the object still visible after an hour.
The report was received by the Director of Operations at Long Beach Air Force Base.
sighted object: bright red object shaped like a half-gallon jar, along with several other ships
witnesses: G. Huffiepe and Bucke, a fire tender at Long Beach Air Force Base
